data.author: ElijahZAwesome

changelog.release_notes: Made it so the colors of the background boxes are darker on color pebbles, you can read it now :)
Changed sans to asriel on the pacifist run.
Made it so the OldGraphics setting is now Which run you are doing, and made the pacifist assets in color for color watch users. changed some stuff in the code and other junk.

KINDA BIG UPDATE: Added Final Froggit, Aaron, and Whimsalot. on color watches (Pebble Time, Pebble Time Round) The Dungeon looks like the Ruins, and the menu is color changed to be based around the different SOULs. also the new floor screen has been changed from a ladder to an elevator, on Pebble 1 & 2 as well.
Changed the Wizard's name to Madjick and changed the shop to the Tem Shop on Pebble 1 and Pebble 2 users ONLY
Added Whimsun and Sans as the final boss of Genocide. Also disabled debug mode becuase I forgot that it was on...

data.description:
NOTE: THIS GAME IS IN BETA. please email me any very important bugs or any suggestions, but keep in mind im not a coding expert.
ONE MORE NOTE: THIS GAME WAS ORIGINALLY MINIDUNGEON, AND ALL CREDIT FOR THE ACTUAL GAME GOES TO THE GUY WHO MADE IT SO DONT YELL AT ME FOR STEALING HIS STUFF
This is a game of traversing through a dungeon and befrending all the monsters or killing them all. You play as Frisk in your adventure to escape the underground dungeon.

ANOTHER NOTE: TO PLAY THE PACIFIST RUN YOU SHOULD USE THE TALK FLIRT AND BE NICE OPTIONS IN THE ACT/ITEM MENU. ALSO TURN ON OLD GRAPHICS IF YOU ARE PLAYING THE PACIFIST RUN SO THAT SOME OF THE ENEMIES FIT THIS RUN.

latest_release.release_notes: Made it so the colors of the background boxes are darker on color pebbles, you can read it now :)

data.title: DungeonTale
